DOC.brief_summary: To investigate impact nutrient supplementation lactation level breast milk .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study meet follow inclusion criterion : 1 . Mother singleton birth , 3742 week gestation ≥ 2490g 2 . Prepregnancy BMI < /= 30 3 . Mother ≥ 18 year age 4 . Mother 46 week postpartum successfully continuously lactate 5 . Mother agree abstain use Docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) , lutein and/or vitamin E contain supplement least 10 day prior provide baseline breast milk sample 6 . Mother agree abstain use nonstudy supplement throughout study 7 . Mother plan continue breastfeed least 6 week start study 8 . No significant ongoing medical problem infant determine infant 's medical history relate parent ( ) enrol center personnel Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : 1 . Subject adverse maternal and/or fetal medical history 2 . Subject participate nonAbbott approve concomitant trial 3 . Mother take cholesterol medication and/or medication affect lipid absorption and/or transport
